text: In Jurkat T cells , induction of PIF DNA binding activity was rapidly induced , required de novo protein synthesis , and was sustained at a high level for at least 23 h . Interestingly , PIF was constitutively activated in human T-cell leukemia virus type 1-transformed MT-2 cells .
